value.description: A dense, horn harvested from the colossal sivatherium. Centuries of exposure to reactive soils and dormant technogenic residues have fused bone and mineral into a single bioactive structure.\n\nWhen ground and refined, it releases microscopic compounds that interact with organic tissue, forming the base for calming agents and ritual mixtures. In its raw form, it remains a highly durable and valuable exotic crafting material.
Fermenting mossmire milk and herbal mix, waiting to become mossmire draught.

li.label: ate scarodon heart slices
li.description: I chewed on the scarodon's heart. It pulsed with raw power, igniting a fire in my chest. I feel stronger, faster, as if I could tear someone apart with my bare hands.

value.description: Slice the still-warm scarodon heart into thin, chewy cuts used in tribal rituals.
Partially prepared slices of scarodon's heart. Still warm and awaiting final processing.

Your body surges with primal energy as the scarodon's essence takes hold. Muscles tighten, instincts sharpen but the fury is fleeting, burning hot before fading. For a brief moment, you are the beast.

Thin slices from the toxin-drenched liver of a hellboar. Used in desperate tribal rites to purge disease and pain at great personal cost. Only the strong survive the purge. The weak may fall before the poison is cleansed.

li.label: liver purge crash
li.description: The aftertaste of the hellboar’s liver won’t leave my mouth. My stomach churns, and my mind swims.

value.description: Slice and purge the toxins of a hellboar's liver to create ritual medicine used by tribal hunters and warriors.

Your gut churns with toxins from the hellboar’s liver. Infection burns away, but your body pays the price. The potent essence floods the bloodstream, dulling pain and forcing the immune system into overdrive but clarity slips away, and the trance leaves the body vulnerable.

A hand-carved pipe packed with the oiled feathers of the legendary harpeagle. The smoke sharpens sight, steadies aim, and extends awareness far beyond the horizon. Tribes speak of hunters who never missed their mark under its haze.

li.label: skyfeather clarity
li.description: The harpeagle’s spirit flows within me my eyes are sharp, my hands steady, and the prey cannot hide.

value.description: Pack the oiled feathers of the harpeagle into a carved pipe, creating a smoke that sharpens the senses.
The oils from harpeagle feathers sharpen your senses, steady your aim, and let you see farther than the horizon.

A refined powder made from the ossified horn of the sivatherium, once used as a stabilizer for ancient hibernation chambers. When ingested in small doses, it slows the mind and heart, easing tension and bringing a gentle sense of euphoria.\n\nIts composition carries traces of bio-synthetic matter from forgotten technologies, making it a coveted substance among tribes and collectors who believe it links mortals to the lost knowledge of the ancients.
Crush and refine sivatherium horn into a fine, bio-reactive powder used in rituals and Ancient power systems.
